mil6.2.3:1.2: “Vigatasatisammosa kho, maharaja, arahanto, natthi arahantanam satisammoso”ti.
mil6.2.3:1.6: “Kutikare, maharaja, sancaritte, vikale kalasannaya, pavarite appavaritasannaya, anatiritte atirittasannaya”ti.
mil6.2.3:2.2: ‘ye apattim apajjanti, te dvihi karanehi apajjanti anadariyena va ajananena va’ti.
mil6.2.3:2.3: Api nu kho, bhante, arahato anadariyam hoti, yam araha apattim apajjati”ti?
mil6.2.3:3.1: “Yadi, bhante nagasena, araha apattim apajjati, natthi ca arahato anadariyam, tena hi atthi arahato satisammoso”ti?
mil6.2.3:3.2: “Natthi, maharaja, arahato satisammoso, apattinca araha apajjati”ti.
mil6.2.3:4.1: “Tena hi, bhante, karanena mam sannapehi, kim tattha karanan”ti?
mil6.2.3:4.6: Yam loke atthi samananam ananucchavikam ananulomikam, gihinam anavajjam.
mil6.2.3:4.7: Tattha bhagava savakanam sikkhapadam pannapeti ‘yavajivam anatikkamaniyan’ti.
mil6.2.3:4.8: Vikalabhojanam, maharaja, lokassa anavajjam, tam jinasasane vajjam.
mil6.2.3:4.9: Bhutagamavikopanam, maharaja, lokassa anavajjam, tam jinasasane vajjam.
mil6.2.3:4.10: Udake hassadhammam, maharaja, lokassa anavajjam, tam jinasasane vajjam.
mil6.2.3:4.11: Iti evarupani evarupani, maharaja, jinasasane vajjani, idam vuccati pannattivajjam.
mil6.2.3:5.1: Yam kilesam pannattivajjam, tam ajananto apajjeyya.
mil6.2.3:5.2: Avisayo, maharaja, ekaccassa arahato sabbam janitum, na hi tassa balam atthi sabbam janitum.
mil6.2.3:5.3: Anannatam, maharaja, arahato itthipurisanam namampi gottampi, maggopi tassa mahiya anannato;
